original_text: (For the Pharisees and all the Jews do not eat unless they wash their hands properly, holding to the tradition of the elders,
korean_text: (바리새인들과 모든 유대인들은 장로들의 전통을 지키어 손을 잘 씻지 않고서는 음식을 먹지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: For the Pharisees and all the Jews
unless they wash their hands properly
holding to the tradition of the elders
